Detailed Description

Configure the Vref.


Defines

#define Adc_enable_external_vref()   (ADMUX &= ~((1<<REFS1)|(1<<REFS0)) )
#define Adc_enable_internal_vref()   (ADMUX |= ((1<<REFS1)|(1<<REFS0)) )
#define Adc_enable_vcc_vref()
